leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算化学-量化计算与工作流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 求解→批量运行→解析/后处理→验证→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 求解器 + 工作流/调度 + 解析器

unit.unit_name: 输出解析/后处理/可视化

queries: [WEB] quantum chemistry output parser library github
[WEB] wavefunction analysis tools computational chemistry github
[WEB] molecular visualization and plotting python github

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing and generating Quantum ESPRESSO input/output files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends pymatgen to support input generation and output parsing for Quantum ESPRESSO, a widely used code for electronic-structure calculations and materials modeling.

tools.name: LobsterPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated bonding analysis package for Lobster outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform automatic bonding analysis using outputs from the LOBSTER program. It enables the analysis of COHP (Crystal Orbital Hamilton Population) and other bonding descriptors in computational materials science.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library for scientific signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for digital signal analysis, offering methods like ARMA, Matrix-Pencil, Singular-Spectrum Analysis (SSA), Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), and Hilbert vibration decomposition for physics and engineering applications.

tools.name: turbomoleio
tools.one_line_profile: Input generation and output parsing for TURBOMOLE
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for generating input files and parsing output files for the TURBOMOLE quantum chemistry software package, facilitating workflow automation.

tools.name: QCElemental
tools.one_line_profile: Core data structures and physical constants for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library providing periodic table data, physical constants, and molecule parsing/validation capabilities. It serves as a core infrastructure component for the MolSSI Quantum Chemistry ecosystem.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for deep learning with molecules and materials
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen for feature extraction.

tools.name: molorbdraw
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for molecular orbitals from cube files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for visualizing molecular orbitals by processing cube files, facilitating electronic structure analysis and presentation.

tools.name: AaronTools.py
tools.one_line_profile: Automation toolkit for quantum chemistry computation workflows
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Python tools for automating routine tasks in quantum chemistry, including input generation, output parsing, and geometry manipulation for various quantum chemistry packages.

tools.name: LobsterPyGUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for LobsterPy bonding analysis
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface for LobsterPy, facilitating the analysis of chemical bonding outputs (COHP/COOP) from the LOBSTER software package.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching method using bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for defect structure-searching in materials, employing chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow manager for defect supercell calculations and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python software for the generation, pre-processing, post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations in materials science.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating and analyzing surface slabs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating slab structures for first-principles calculations of surfaces and analyzing their properties.

tools.name: HortonMachine
tools.one_line_profile: Hydro-geomorphological analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based library and platform for hydro-geomorphological modeling and analysis, providing tools for terrain analysis and hydrological simulations.

tools.name: FFT-spectrum-analyzer
tools.one_line_profile: FFT spectrum analyzer for machinery vibration analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for performing Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) spectrum analysis, specifically designed for machinery vibration analysis and signal processing.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality rendering of atoms and molecules using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to generate high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atomic structures and molecules.

tools.name: Cclib.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia bindings for the cclib computational chemistry parsing library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing bindings to the cclib Python package, allowing users to parse and analyze logfiles from various computational chemistry software packages within the Julia programming environment.

tools.name: cclib
tools.one_line_profile: Standard library for parsing computational chemistry logfiles
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for parsing and interpreting the results of computational chemistry packages. It provides a unified interface to extract data such as geometries, energies, orbitals, and vibrational modes from output files of dozens of quantum chemistry programs.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced visualization for atomic structures in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to provide highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations for atomic structures (ASE Atoms or Pymatgen Structure objects) directly within the Jupyter Notebook environment.

tools.name: qccodec
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for quantum chemistry outputs into structured QCIO objects
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to parsing output files from various quantum chemistry programs into standardized, structured data objects defined by the Quantum Chemistry I/O (QCIO) schema, facilitating data interoperability.

tools.name: qcop
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized runner for quantum chemistry programs
tools.detailed_description: A package for executing Quantum Chemistry programs (like TeraChem, Psi4, QChem, NWChem, ORCA) using standardized QCIO data structures, abstracting the execution layer for workflow automation.

tools.name: kg4vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Kubo-Greenwood transport properties calculator for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate transport properties (such as electrical conductivity) using the Kubo-Greenwood formula based on First Principle Molecular Dynamics simulations performed with VASP.

tools.name: OpenQube
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reading quantum chemistry output and generating volumetric data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source C++ library designed to read quantum chemistry output files and calculate molecular orbitals and electron density cubes. It serves as a backend for visualization software like Avogadro.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates many-body potential energy surfaces (PES) and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations, enabling ab initio accuracy with the efficiency of classical MD.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction
tools.detailed_description: A program and library implementing the D4 London dispersion correction model, which provides generally applicable atomic-charge dependent dispersion corrections for density functional theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: thermoanalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone thermochemistry analysis for ORCA and Gaussian
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for performing thermochemical analysis based on frequency calculations from quantum chemistry packages like ORCA and Gaussian, allowing for recalculation of thermodynamic properties under different conditions.

tools.name: OPI
tools.one_line_profile: ORCA Python Interface for workflow automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for the ORCA quantum chemistry program, facilitating the creation, execution, and analysis of ORCA calculations within Python scripts and workflows.

tools.name: TheoDORE
tools.one_line_profile: Wavefunction analysis for excited states
tools.detailed_description: A software package for Theoretical Density, Orbital Relaxation, and Exciton analysis. It specializes in analyzing excited state calculations (e.g., TDDFT, ADC) to characterize electronic transitions.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotting tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages pymatgen to generate enhanced band structure plots, including features for visualizing atomic or orbital contributions using RGB color scales.

tools.name: mdciao
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the accessible analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics (MD) simulation data, offering tools for residue-residue contact analysis and other collective variables.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program based on Pymatgen for processing materials simulation data, providing utilities for structure manipulation and property extraction.

tools.name: compchem_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for AiiDA, pymatgen, and VASP input/output handling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions designed to streamline the setup of inputs and analysis of outputs for computational chemistry workflows involving AiiDA, pymatgen, and VASP.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: Provides a Python interface for the ANI-1 neural network potential within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling machine learning-driven molecular dynamics and structure optimization.

tools.name: molbokeh
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization using Bokeh
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to create interactive visualizations of molecules, allowing users to view molecular structures with hover details using the Bokeh library.

tools.name: vasp_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing and analysis scripts for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Bash and Python scripts aimed at simplifying the post-processing and analysis of output data from VASP density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: gaussian_matrix_parser
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix extractor for Gaussian log files
tools.detailed_description: A utility to parse Gaussian quantum chemistry log files and extract matrices, saving them into text format for further analysis.

tools.name: vasp-ase-interface
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP
tools.detailed_description: An updated Python interface for VASP that complies with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) standards, facilitating VASP calculations within ASE workflows.

tools.name: pourbaix
tools.one_line_profile: Pourbaix diagram generator using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Pourbaix (potential-pH) diagrams for electrochemical stability analysis using Python and the pymatgen library.

tools.name: pawpyseed
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel analysis of PAW DFT wavefunctions
tools.detailed_description: A parallel C/Python package designed for the numerical analysis of Projector Augmented Wave (PAW) Density Functional Theory (DFT) wavefunctions.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: Helper functions and utilities for working with and analyzing structure graphs generated by pymatgen, facilitating graph-based materials analysis.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for perovskite structure distortions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for nanoscale atomic scenes and STEM simulations
tools.detailed_description: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic scenes using pymatgen, specifically designed for preparing structures for S/TEM image simulation.

tools.name: libwfa
tools.one_line_profile: Wave-function analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for wavefunction analysis in quantum chemistry, supporting various analysis methods for electronic structure data.

tools.name: chemtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for quantum chemical calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing various tools and utilities to support quantum chemical calculations and analysis.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Project workflow management
tools.detailed_description: A custom workflow package merging pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks, designed for managing high-throughput calculations for the Materials Project.

tools.name: mpmorph
tools.one_line_profile: AIMD calculation analysis and workflow tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations using VASP, built upon the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis and structure manipulation library
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Alloy system analysis for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and functions specifically for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis module for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A pymatgen add-on providing specialized tools for modeling and analyzing point defects in materials.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management for pymatgen structures
tools.detailed_description: An addon for pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of Materials Project-style databases for materials data.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator designed to ensure VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with Materials Project standards and data structures.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion analysis tools for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen providing algorithms and tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and mechanisms in materials.

tools.name: ChemPlot
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical space visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to the visualization of chemical space, helping to explore and understand the distribution of chemical datasets.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal structure viewer using fresnel and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for crystal structures that leverages pymatgen for structure handling and fresnel for high-quality rendering, designed for materials science research.

tools.name: VASP-DOS-plots
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting tool for VASP Projected Density of States (PDOS)
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based utility to parse VASP output files (POSCAR, DOSCAR) and generate plots for projected density of states, supporting spin polarization and spin-orbit coupling.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between Pymatgen and OpenMM for MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen IO module designed to set up OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating the workflow between materials analysis and MD engines.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for interactive band structure and DOS plotting
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter notebook widget that provides interactive visualization capabilities for electronic band structures and density of states, developed by the OSSCAR project.

tools.name: DBSTEP
tools.one_line_profile: DFT-based Steric Parameters extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to extract molecular shape and steric descriptors (like Sterimol parameters) from 3D molecular structures, useful for chemoinformatics and QSAR studies.

tools.name: Lobster
tools.one_line_profile: Language models for Biological Sequence Transformation
tools.detailed_description: A library for training and applying language models to biological sequences (proteins), focusing on evolutionary representation and sequence transformation tasks.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management platform and IDE for computational materials science that integrates various simulation codes (DFT, MD) into a unified framework with data management.

tools.name: OpenFermion
tools.one_line_profile: Library for compiling and analyzing quantum algorithms for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library for compiling and analyzing quantum algorithms to simulate fermionic systems, specifically electronic structure problems in quantum chemistry.

tools.name: LOBSTER-dataset-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for generating and analyzing the LOBSTER molecular superposition dataset
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and tools provided by the Rarey Lab to generate, process, and analyze the LOBSTER dataset, which focuses on small molecule superpositions for structure-based drug design.

tools.name: Multiwfn-mirror
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of Multiwfn: A Multifunctional Wavefunction Analyzer
tools.detailed_description: A mirror repository for Multiwfn, a comprehensive wavefunction analysis program capable of performing a wide variety of analyses on electronic structure data.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonian solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for constructing and solving Slater-Koster tight-binding Hamiltonians, particularly for analyzing topological properties of materials.

tools.name: orcabas
tools.one_line_profile: Basis set parser for ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based utility to parse and manage basis set information for the ORCA quantum chemistry software package.

tools.name: mogli
tools.one_line_profile: Simple visualization of molecules in Python
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library for visualizing molecules, supporting various rendering styles and capable of running in Jupyter environments.

tools.name: pdos_plotter
tools.one_line_profile: Plot PDOS from VASP output
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool specifically designed to extract and plot Projected Density of States (PDOS) data from VASP calculation outputs.

tools.name: charge_transfer_integral
tools.one_line_profile: Compute inter-molecule charge transfer integral using Multiwfn
tools.detailed_description: A workflow script that invokes Multiwfn to calculate the charge transfer integral between molecules using the site-energy correction method.

tools.name: gMultiwfn
tools.one_line_profile: Gfortran distribution of Multiwfn
tools.detailed_description: A third-party distribution of the Multiwfn wavefunction analyzer, compiled with gfortran to ensure accessibility and open-source compliance.

tools.name: carmm
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for molecular model creation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts for the creation, manipulation, and analysis of geometric and electronic structures of molecular models, supporting computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: lobster-local
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics-focused AI coding assistant
tools.detailed_description: A local AI tool tailored for bioinformatics tasks, acting as a coding assistant to facilitate data analysis and script generation in biological research contexts.

tools.name: chemtools
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretive chemical tools for quantum chemistry output analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing interpretive tools for analyzing the outputs of quantum chemistry calculations, focusing on conceptual density functional theory (CDFT) and other chemical descriptors.

tools.name: Horton
tools.one_line_profile: Helpful Open-source Research TOol for N-fermion systems
tools.detailed_description: A modular quantum chemistry software package for performing electronic structure calculations, with a focus on post-processing and analysis of wavefunctions.

tools.name: Horton3
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation workflows for Horton quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: The third version of the HORTON package, redesigned as a set of workflows integrating independent modules (IOData, Grid, GBasis) for flexible quantum chemistry calculations and analysis.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for high-throughput VASP workflows
tools.detailed_description: A workflow automation tool designed to work with pymatgen for managing and executing high-throughput computational materials science simulations, specifically focusing on VASP calculations.

tools.name: EzReson
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for chemical resonance analysis from quantum chemistry wavefunctions
tools.detailed_description: An efficient toolkit that implements the quantitative theory of resonance by expanding wavefunctions from DFT/HF calculations (e.g., Gaussian) in terms of Lewis structures to analyze chemical resonance.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python package for plotting ternary phase diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization tool for drawing ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) in materials science and chemistry, offering a simpler and standalone alternative to heavier frameworks like pymatgen.

tools.name: sisl
tools.one_line_profile: Electronic structure package for large-scale tight-binding and NEGF calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for manipulating atomic structures, constructing tight-binding Hamiltonians, and performing post-processing/analysis of DFT outputs (supporting Siesta, VASP, Wannier90, etc.) and NEGF transport calculations.
